properties.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 30 at 6:39PM AKST until January 31 at 12:00PM AKST by NWS Fairbanks, AK
properties.description:
* WHAT...Snow, blowing snow, and dangerously cold wind chills to
60 below occurring. The cold wind chills will cause frostbite in
as little as 10 minutes to exposed skin. Visibility may be
reduced to one mile or less at times.

* WHERE...Eastern Beaufort Sea Coast.

* WHEN...Until 6 PM Friday.

* ADDITIONAL DETAILS...West winds of 15 to 25 mph will support
blowing snow and cold wind chills to 60 below.
properties.instruction:
A Winter Weather Advisory for blowing snow means that
visibilities will be limited due to strong winds blowing snow
around. Use caution when traveling, especially in open areas. The
latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

NWSheadline: WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 PM AKST FRIDAY
